      • add

        public void add(java.util.ArrayList<CV> CVList,
       CV cv)
        Description copied from interface: CVManager
        Adds a CV with all its fields in the object that stores the CVs.
        Specified by:
        add in interface CVManager
        Parameters:
        CVList - Holds a reference to the object that stores CVs in memory - in this care it is ArrayList.
        cv - Reference to the CV to be added.

      • view

        public void view(java.util.ArrayList<CV> CVs)
        Description copied from interface: CVManager
        Allows the user to view all CVs added so far in the storage object.
        Specified by:
        view in interface CVManager
        Parameters:
        CVs - Holds a reference to the object that stores CVs in memory - in this care it is ArrayList

      • view

        public void view(java.util.ArrayList<CV> CVs,
        int order)
        Specified by:
        view in interface CVManager
        Parameters:
        CVs - Holds a reference to the object that stores CVs in memory - in this care it is ArrayList
        order - This variable tells the program to pull out a certain CV from the storage object. CVs are stored as they added so int order of 2 means that the second added CV will be shown.
